title: 1000 Counting numbers!!!
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If the product of 1000 natural numbers is 1000, then what is their minimum sum?"}]}]}

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1000 = 5 x 5 x 5 x 2 x 2 x 2 = 5 x 5 x 5 x 2 x 2 x 2 x 1 x 1 x 1 x ..... 994  1's"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So their minimum sum is 5x3 + 2x3 + 1x994 = 1015"}]},{"type":"text","text":"
